Dear NHTSA,

We at ForgeFX Training Simulations are excited to submit our proposal for the development of an immersive virtual reality training program on impaired driving for law enforcement. Our company specializes in the creation of high-quality, custom interactive 3D simulation and visualization software products, and we have extensive experience in developing virtual and augmented reality application for a wide range of industries.

We understand the critical importance of training law enforcement professionals to identify and remove impaired drivers from our nation's roadways. The increasing number of roadway deaths and the devastating impact of drunk-driving crashes is a pressing issue that must be addressed. We believe that our immersive virtual reality training program will provide law enforcement officials with a realistic and effective tool for identifying and apprehending impaired drivers.

We will work closely with subject matter experts in the areas of drug-impaired driving enforcement, including drug recognition experts, instructors, and coordinators, to inform the training approach and material. Our program will be designed to mimic real-world scenarios, providing law enforcement officials with the knowledge and skills necessary to identify and handle impaired drivers in a safe and effective manner.

We also understand the limitations and concerns associated with dosing live individuals for the purpose of curriculum development, and we are committed to reducing unnecessary risks of harm and monetary costs.

We look forward to the opportunity to work with you on this important project and to contribute to the DOT's Strategic Goal of Safety by reducing fatalities and serious injuries on our nation's roadways.

Please let us know if you have any further questions or require additional information.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
ForgeFX Training Simulations.
